descr: "A group of related requests that can be used to capture intended activities that have inter-dependencies such as \"give this medication after that one\"."

fields.name: label
fields.descr: "A user-visible label for the action."

fields.name: title
fields.descr: "The title of the action displayed to a user."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "A short description of the action used to provide a summary to display to the user."

fields.name: textEquivalent
fields.descr: "A text equivalent of the action to be performed. This provides a human-interpretable description of the action when the definition is consumed by a system that may not be capable of interpreting it dynamically."

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "A code that provides meaning for the action or action group. For example, a section may have a LOINC code for a the section of a documentation template."

fields.name: documentation
fields.descr: "Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources."

fields.name: condition
fields.descr: "An expression that describes applicability criteria, or start/stop conditions for the action."

fields.name: relatedAction
fields.descr: "A relationship to another action such as \"before\" or \"30-60 minutes after start of\"."

fields.name: timingDateTime
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: timingPeriod
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: timingDuration
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: timingRange
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: timingTiming
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: participant
fields.descr: "The participant that should perform or be responsible for this action."

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "The type of action to perform (create, update, remove)."

fields.name: groupingBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines the grouping behavior for the action and its children."

fields.name: selectionBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines the selection behavior for the action and its children."

fields.name: requiredBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines the requiredness behavior for the action."

fields.name: precheckBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines whether the action should usually be preselected."

fields.name: cardinalityBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines whether the action can be selected multiple times."

fields.name: resource
fields.descr: "The resource that is the target of the action (e.g. CommunicationRequest)."

fields.name: action
fields.descr: "Sub actions."

fields.name: modifierExtension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element, and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."
 derived from BackboneElement

fields.name: id
fields.descr:
"unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces."
